Articles.Content:
Hi,

I've recently installed the Astronomer's Visual pack: Edge of Oblivion but I can't get the citylights to show up as featured in the video:

Does anyone have an idea how I can do this?

Thanks!

Actually I believe the city lights are from the EVE mod itself, rather than a retexture by Edge of Oblivion.

They are also corrupted. We'll have to wait for that mod to be updated to .25

In the meantime I suggest simply deleting them

Ah ty. Thought so already, guess I'll have to wait for a bit then. Also waiting for the Paradise release.

Thanks btw
This affair about an add-on has been moved to Add-on Affairs.
To fix this go into the CityLights folder and delete the .tga's since png's don't replace tga's and Astronomer is using png's.
Thanks for moving was probably sleepy when I posted this, and thanks for all the help.
